headline: Thames Water Picks KKR as Preferred Bidder in Equity Raise
summary: The water utility selected the private equity company as preferred partner to help it deal with its debt pile, but warned that bondholders might have to take losses under the firm’s proposal.

raw.headline: Thames Water Picks KKR as Preferred Bidder in Equity Raise
raw.summary: The water utility selected the private equity company as preferred partner to help it deal with its debt pile, but warned that bondholders might have to take losses under the firm’s proposal.

headline: Global Atlantic 2025 Retirement Outlook Survey: Majority of Investors Worried about Outliving Assets
summary: NEW YORK, March 31, 2025--Global Atlantic Financial Group ("Global Atlantic"), a leading insurance company meeting the retirement and life insurance needs of individuals and institutions, today released results from its 2025 Retirement Outlook Survey, revealing mounting anxiety among investors surveyed around retirement security.

headline: Exclusive-Brookfield nears $9 billion-plus deal for Colonial Pipeline, sources say
summary: Brookfield Asset Management is putting the final touches on a deal to acquire Colonial Pipeline, the largest U.S. fuel transportation system, for more than $9 billion including debt, people familiar...

headline: Thames Water Chooses KKR as Preferred Partner for Recapitalization
summary: The debt-laden water utility selected U.S. private equity company KKR as its preferred partner to lead its recapitalization.

headline: Thames Picks KKR as Potential Owner to Lead it Out of Crisis
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Thames Water selected KKR & Co. as its preferred partner for the next stage of its efforts to raise equity and turn around the debt-laden business. summary: Troubled utility Thames Water has chosen New York-based private equity firm Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, KKR, as its preferred bidder as it looks to secure a buyer to help stabilise its finances.The...
